overview:
Anastasia is the Co-Founder of Makeably, a marketplace exclusively for custom-made creative items for your everyday life.

Prior to Makeably, Anastasia spent 5+ years at Google. She worked in Mountain View as Product Marketing Manager, where she focused on growing acquisitions and awareness for the Google Display Network. She moved to London in 2009 to look after Publisher Monetization Marketing (AdSense, DoubleClick for Publishers, DLCK Ad Exchange). In 2010, Anastasia took on a role as a New Business Development Manager, where she led entrepreneurship outreach efforts in EMEA and many early-stage technology partnerships for Google Voice, Google Chrome, and Google Wallet.

Anastasia graduated from the University of Pennsylvania with a triple major in Psychology, Sociology, and French. Prior to moving to the US, Anastasia lived in Russia, Vietnam, Bahrain, Hungary, and France, and she currently resides in London.
